Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Southbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Roosevelt, State, Archer and Clark: due to street blockage near Clark/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my route?

 

Southbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Roosevelt, State, Archer, Clark and over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Roosevelt.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to a mechanical problem.

As a result, trains are operating only between Wellington and Clark/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested form Kimball to Belmont to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
